sentences.en: A crustacean is an animal that has a firm shell and usually lives in water.
sentences.cn: 甲壳类动物是指具有坚硬外壳、通常生活在水中的动物.

sentences.en: A crustacean seafood, in the use of water before cooking scrub clean its shell.
sentences.cn: 有甲壳的海鲜, 在烹调之前要用清水将其外壳刷洗干净.

sentences.en: A pincer like claw of a crustacean or an arachnida lobster , crab , or scorpion.
sentences.cn: 无毒的蜘蛛类节肢动物,形似蝎子,尾巴细长而无毒刺.

sentences.en: Daphnia has a large number of never-before seen genes, as well as a big chunk of the same genes found in humans, the most of any insects or crustacean so far known to scientists.
sentences.cn: 水蚤有大量之前从未见过的基因，也有一大堆在人类身上就发现的相同基因，其数量是至今科学家所知的昆虫或甲壳类生物中最多的。

sentences.en: Diners in Shanghai and Hong Kong are the biggest consumers of this freshwater 6 crustacean.
sentences.cn: 上海和香港的食客是这种淡水甲壳类的最大顾客群.

sentences.en: Enclosure experiment is carried out to study impacts of filter - feeding silver carp on crustacean community.
sentences.cn: 采用围隔实验的方法研究滤食性鲢鱼对浮游甲壳动物群落的影响.

sentences.en: Every crustacean has a layer of shell, which is also called the carapace.
sentences.cn: 甲壳动物体外都有一层几丁质外壳, 称为甲壳.

sentences.en: Glucosamine can help to synthesize chitin in crustacean shells, which aids growth.
sentences.cn: 葡萄糖氨是甲壳类动物帮助壳中几丁质的生成，可促进生长。

sentences.en: It is a neuropeptide member belonging to the crustacean hyperglycemic hormone ( CHH ) neuropeptide family.
sentences.cn: 除MIH外,CHH家族 神经肽还包括高血糖激素、性腺抑制激素 ( Gonad-inhibiting hormone, GIH ) 和大颚器官抑制激素(Mandibularorgan -inhibitinghormone,MOIH).

sentences.en: Molt - inhibiting hormone ( MIH ) is a member of CHH ( crustacean hyperglycemic hormone ) family.
sentences.cn: 蜕皮抑制激素 ( molt -inhibitinghormone, MIH ) 属甲壳动物高血糖激素 ( crustaceanhyperglycemichormone,CHH ) 家族.

sentences.en: Other hunters, like this octopus, are also attracted to the crustacean feast.
sentences.cn: 其他捕猎者, 如这只章鱼, 也同样对这个盛宴感兴趣.

sentences.en: Researchers found the 70-millimeter crustacean in the dark shale of an Oklahoma quarry.
sentences.cn: 研究者在俄克拉荷马采石场的页岩层发现这些70毫米的甲壳纲动物。

sentences.en: Seafood is a valuable lobster crustacean section.
sentences.cn: 名贵海珍品龙虾属甲壳科.

sentences.en: The illustrious Cuvier did not perceive that a barnacle was a crustacean.
sentences.cn: 大名鼎鼎的居维叶也未看出藤壶是一种甲壳动物.

sentences.en: This is the world's largest crustacean and the seven king crabs introduced here from the North Pacific by Russian scientists in 1961 have multiplied at an astonishing rate.
sentences.cn: 这是世界上最大的甲壳类动物。 俄罗斯科学家在1961年从北太平洋引进这里的七只帝王蟹已以惊人的速度成倍增长。

sentences.en: This pink tendril is another new species of crustacean found in the Sea of Japan (East Sea), near South Korea's Gangwon Province.
sentences.cn: 这个粉红的卷须状物种是科学家在韩国江原道附近的日本海（东海）发现的甲壳类生物。

trans.tran_en: an animal such as a  lobster  or a  crab  that has a hard outer shell and several pairs of legs, and usually lives in water
